## üß© Module License {.unnumbered}

At RAISINS, we believe in accessibility and flexibility for all learners. That‚Äôs why **each app is available as an independent module**, allowing you to subscribe only to the tools you need. Whether you're analyzing a simple test or running complex analysis modules, you can unlock any app on a monthly or 6-month basis, starting at **just ‚Çπ199**. This modular approach is perfect for individual students and researchers who need targeted analysis without the commitment of a full institutional plan. Simply click on the app listed under [Analysis Modules](index.qmd#analysis) and choose a *monthly or 6-month license*, starting at just ‚Çπ199. This modular subscription is perfect for students and researchers who need access to specific tools for a limited period.

> üí° *Module Licenses are specific to individual apps and are ideal for personal or single-user access. If you are affiliated with an academic or research institution and require full access to all RAISINS modules, please refer to the Institutional License section below and encourage your institution to partner with us.*

## üè´ Institutional License {.unnumbered}

We also offer comprehensive **Institutional Licenses** to support collaborative research and academic teaching. These plans provide **Access to all RAISINS apps** for a fixed number of users within a department, college, or university. Whether you're supervising a small team or managing a large institution, there‚Äôs a plan designed to fit your scale and scope.

> *Institutional licenses are ideal for teaching labs, research projects, and campus-wide adoption of RAISINS.*
